title: Sunshine on Scotland Street
author: McCall Smith, Alexander
snippet: he wondered. Looking at Angus  now as they walked up Dublin Street towards York Place  and Queen Street, he was not at all sure what Angus  thought. Angus had failed to make the most elementary  preparations for the wedding, failing to check his kilt and  forgetting altogether to buy a ring.

title: Sunshine on Scotland Street
author: McCall Smith, Alexander
snippet: Angus was largely silent as they walked up Dublin  Street. At the top of the street, though, and when they  began to make their way along the pavement opposite  the Scottish National Portrait Gallery, he began to talk  again.
